Subject: Units
Information: All units are in ng/L which is the same as parts per trillion (ppt).

Subject: PFAS results labeled as "ND" or <X
Information: In some cases we do not have information on the detection limit for a given sample. In these cases when the result is below the limit of detection you will see ND which stands for "not detected". In cases where a limit of detection is available you will see a "<" before a number. In this case, the number next to the detection symbol is the highest the lab could detect.

Subject: "Not Measured"
Information: If a cell says "Not Measured" it means the sample was not tested for that particular compound.

Subject: "Not Provided"
Information: If a cell says "Not Provided" it means the analyte was measured but that part of the dataset was not provided to CDPHE.
